summary: DOD's Office of Research and Engineering helps DOD quickly adopt innovative tech. The office has developed a national strategy to guide DOD's science and tech efforts and investments. But the military services' tech strategies don't always line up with DOD's, which might lead to competing or conflicting efforts. Also, the office doesn't receive detailed and timely budget information. So, it can't determine whether the military...
title: Defense Research and Engineering: Action Needed to Improve Management and Oversight of Technology Investments
